title: twig attribute function
description: The attribute function allows you to call a method or an array item on an object.

title: twig block function
description: Blocks are used for inheritance and act as placeholders and replacements at the same time. They are documented in detail in the documentation for the extends tag.
Block names must consist of alphanumeric characters, and underscores. The first char can't be a digit and dashes are not permitted.

title: twig constant function
description: The constant function allows you to get the value of a class constant.

title: twig country_timezones function
description: The country_timezones function allows you to get the timezones for a given country.

title: twig cycle function
description: The cycle function allows you to cycle over values.

title: twig date function
description: The date function allows you to format a date.

title: twig dump function
description: The dump function allows you to dump a variable.

title: twig html_classes function
description: The html_classes function allows you to convert an array of HTML classes into a string.

title: twig include function
description: The include function allows you to include a template.

title: twig max function
description: The max function allows you to get the maximum value in a sequence.

title: twig min function
description: The min function allows you to get the minimum value in a sequence.

title: twig parent function
description: The parent function allows you to call the parent block.

title: twig random function
description: The random function allows you to get a random value from a sequence.

title: twig range function
description: The range function allows you to create a sequence of numbers.

title: twig source function
description: The source function allows you to get the source code of a template.

title: twig template_from_string function
description: The template_from_string function allows you to create a template from a string.
